messages.content: Conversation: User: Please route export_document with details a task to update the notes in Quick Tasks. Assistant: Thanks. Tool_call only or tool_call plus a short confirmation? User: Include a one-line confirmation.
Connector action set for export_document.

Conversation: User: Map message_composition to a connector action with details: a task to send the summary in Today List. Assistant: Okay. Should I include a brief confirmation along with the tool_call? User: Tool_call plus a short confirmation.
Connector action set for message_composition.

User message: Please route email_composition with details an export of a quick summary as txt. Assistant reply: Thanks. Tool_call only or tool_call plus a short confirmation? User follow-up: Tool_call plus a short confirmation.
Routing via connector action: email_composition.

User message: I need a connector action for cancel_booking: an upload of summary_notes.md to Shared Drive. Assistant reply: Thanks. Tool_call only or tool_call plus a short confirmation? User follow-up: Add a brief confirmation line.
Routing via connector action: cancel_booking. Bad: mismatch intent and action. Good: action matches intent_subtype.

User: I need a connector action for book_ride: a task to review the draft brief in Quick Tasks. Assistant: Got it. Want just the tool_call, or a short confirm line? User: Add a brief confirmation line.
Prepared connector action for book_ride.

Conversation: User: Please route export_document with details an export of a mock brief as docx. Assistant: Got it. Want just the tool_call, or a short confirm line? User: Just the tool_call, no extra text.
This maps to the connector action for export_document.
U: Action mapping request: book_ride, details an upload of schedule.csv to Team Archive. A: Got it. Want just the tool_call, or a short confirm line? U: Just the tool_call, no extra text.
Prepared connector action for book_ride.

U: Map message_composition to a connector action with details: a zip of brief.txt, notes.md, summary.csv. A: Thanks. Tool_call only or tool_call plus a short confirmation? U: Just the tool_call, no extra text.
Routing via connector action: message_composition.

Conversation: User: Please map this to a connector action: note_editing for a calendar entry for planning session at next week. Assistant: Got it. Want just the tool_call, or a short confirm line? User: Tool_call plus a short confirmation.
This maps to the connector action for note_editing. Bad: mismatch intent and action. Good: action matches intent_subtype.

User: Map document_creation to a connector action with details: a definition of the open questions. Assistant: Thanks. Tool_call only or tool_call plus a short confirmation? User: Just the tool_call, no extra text.
Prepared connector action for document_creation.

Conversation: User: Use a connector action to handle add_task: a short note to Jordan about the checklist. Assistant: Understood. Do you want a one-line explanation or tool_call only? User: Tool_call only is fine.
This maps to the connector action for add_task.

Conversation: User: Set up connector action for message_composition: a rewrite of a mock brief. Assistant: Thanks. Tool_call only or tool_call plus a short confirmation? User: Add a brief confirmation line.
Prepared connector action for message_composition. Bad: mismatch intent and action. Good: action matches intent_subtype.
User: Action mapping request: zip_files, details a route from Lakeview to South Point. Assistant: Got it. Want just the tool_call, or a short confirm line? User: Add a brief confirmation line.
I will route this to the connector action for zip_files. Bad: ignore the requested action type. Good: align tool_call action.

Context: User: I need a connector action for document_creation: a simple outline for a quick summary. Assistant: Got it. Want just the tool_call, or a short confirm line? User: Tool_call plus a short confirmation.
Routing via connector action: document_creation.

User message: Action mapping request: note_editing, details a zip of report.pdf, appendix.txt. Assistant reply: Got it. Do you want the tool_call only or a short confirmation line too? User follow-up: Tool_call only is fine.
I will route this to the connector action for note_editing.

Context: User: Please route upload_file_request with details a zip of plan.md, tasks.csv. Assistant: Okay. Should I include a brief confirmation along with the tool_call? User: Tool_call only is fine.
Connector action set for upload_file_request. Bad: drop details. Good: pass the action context to the tool_call.

User: I need a connector action for zip_files: a brainstorm list about the action items. Assistant: Understood. Do you want a one-line explanation or tool_call only? User: Just the tool_call, no extra text.
Routing via connector action: zip_files.

Context: User: Set up connector action for place_order: a task to prepare the demo in Follow-ups. Assistant: Got it. Do you want the tool_call only or a short confirmation line too? User: Tool_call plus a short confirmation.
Routing via connector action: place_order. Bad: ignore the requested action type. Good: align tool_call action.
